name: LD 41 Kinesis
description:
Entry for the LD 41, I am in a hurry... late for work. excuse me

Kinesis Test it's a platformer card control game. So it's was made for Ludum dare 41, and this was the theme: "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". Maybe you can't belive me, but this was harder than you think. Help "Kiddo" to use his abilities to reach the end in every test. There it's a history really deep down, but maybe in future version... if people like it. overall it's was really fun to do this, I enjoy the result. Feel free to coment a tell me what you think, it's gonna be appreciated. Keep in the flow.
